name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Highly skilled Senior Odoo Engineer with 8 years of experience in **Python** development, database management, and system integration, specializing in Odoo implementation and customization. Proficient in data migration and business process analysis, I leverage my strong technical support skills and problem-solving abilities to deliver effective solutions tailored to client needs. My background in full-stack development encompasses modern frameworks and technologies, including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Possessing a solid foundation in CI/CD automation and microservices architecture, I am committed to building robust applications that ensure seamless integration across platforms while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. A self-motivated professional, I excel in communication and documentation, providing clients with thorough insights into system functionalities and implementations.
